content: er represents the wind speed, in knots. | | sid | `'string'` | Standard Instrument Departure procedure that ensures aircraft are separated from other traffic safely and efficiently after takeoff from the airport. | | sidType | `'string'` | Type of the SID. SID or RNAV_SID. | | star | `'string'` | Standard Terminal Arrival Route procedures to guide aircraft safely and efficiently to their destination airport, helping ensure orderly separation from other traffic. | | starType | `'string'` | Type of the STAR. STAR or RNAV_STAR. | | routeDistance | `'string'` | Total distance between two points along a specified flight path or air route, in NM. | | descentSpeed | `'string'` | The rate at which an aircraft descends from its cruising altitude to its destination airport during the descent phase of flight. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information. | # Flight Plan Alternative Airport Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier. | | stationIataCode | `'string'` | Station IATA code. | | stationIcaoCode | `'string'` | Station ICAO code. | | type | `'string'` | Type of the alternative airport. Alternative Departure Airport, Alternative Arrival Airport, Primary Alternative Arrival Airport, EFB Alternative Arrival Airport or Enroute Alternative Airport. | | averageWindComponent | `'string'` | Average headwind or tailwind speed information along the route. '-' indicates headwind, '+' indicates tailwind and the number represents the wind speed, in knots. | | routeDistance | `'string'` | Total distance between two points along a specified flight path or air route, in NM. | | cumulatedBurnOffFuel | `'number'` | Total amount of fuel that has been consumed during a flight or a specific period of flight, in kilograms. | | alternateFuel | `'number'` | The amount of additional fuel carried by an aircraft to reach and potentially hold at alternate airp
